pkgmetadata.longdescription: Road Network Projection // Project road network development based on an existing road network, target locations to be connected by roads and a cost surface. Road projection methods include minimum spanning tree with least cost path (Kruskal's algorithm (1956) doi:10.2307/2033241), least cost path (Dijkstra's algorithm (1959) doi:10.1007/BF01386390) or snapping. These road network projection methods are ideal for use with land cover change projection models.
